title: Missouri Foundation for Health Basic Support

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.  87      INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN CRAIG SCHMID     An ordinance authorizing and directing the Mayor, on the behalf of the City of St. Louis, to submit all necessary applications and to enter into agreements with the Missouri Foundation for Health or any other agency for the "Missouri Foundation for Health Basic Support - Cycle III" Program and authorizing the Mayor, upon approval of the Board of Estimate and Apportionment, to expend any funds received by said grants to fulfill the obligations of the grants, and containing an emergency clause.
